name: THE-FEEDBACK_REPO
description: A sample JSON structure for the GitHub repository 'THE-FEEDBACK_REPO'.

components.name: 00_GENERAL_INFO
components.description: A folder containing general information files.

children.name: general.md
children.description: A file containing general information about the project.

components.name: 01_UX_CONFIG_FIXES
components.description: A folder containing files regarding UX configuration fixes.

children.name: ux_config_fixes.md
children.description: A file containing specifcs about UX configuration fix suggestiond/ideas.

components.name: 02_BUILD_SPECIFICATIONS
components.description: A folder containing files regarding build specifications.

children.name: sweet-spot_builds.md
children.description: A file containing specifcs about sweet-spot builds for different framework products.

components.name: 03_VISION
components.description: A folder containing files regaring visions, ideas ans plans for the future.

children.name: vision.md
children.description: A file containing specifcs about visions, ideas and plans for the future.

components.name: 04_ETHICS
components.description: A folder containing files regarding the ethics of the company and its products.

children.name: ethics.md
children.description: A file containing specifcs about questions/suggestions about the ethics of the company and its products.

components.name: 05_COMMUNITY_EVENTS
components.description: A folder containing files regarding community event plans and ideas.

children.name: community_events.md
children.description: A file containing specifcs about community event plans and ideas.

components.name: 99_ASSETS
components.description: A folder containing folder and files regarding assets used in the project.

children.name: Deprecated
children.description: A folder containing deprecated assets no longer in use or for viewing purposes only.

children.name: Framework_Feedback_Summary_1.pdf
children.description: An old version of the compressed feedback summary document.

children.name: Visuals
children.description: A folder containing the visual assets used in the project.

components.name: README.md
components.description: The main README file for the project.

components.name: structure.json
components.description: The JSON structure file representing the project structure.
